name: Nom Nom Venom
description:
Nom Nom Venom was made for the Philly Dev Night - Eat This Jam (link). Theme: Extreme Mastication.

It's a TWO player memory game (never coded the AI) where you take turns poisoning and swapping dishes around, and then picking a dish to eat. 

Anyone who eats a poisoned dish loses.

The game won a judge's award for Most Original Game.

Known bugs:

  • Sometimes dishes remain on the playing field on restart. Requires page refresh.
  • Course counting doesn't reset.
